alert.note: Alert for Alger; Keweenaw; Luce (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lakeshore Flood Warning issued December 22 at 3:49PM EST until December 24 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...LAKESHORE FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM FRIDAY TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Significant lakeshore flooding expected. * WHERE...Keweenaw, Alger and Luce Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM Friday to 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads closed and low lying property including parking lots, lawns, and homes and businesses will be inundated near the lake. Some shoreline erosion will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest waves start Friday afternoon for Alger and Keweenaw counties, with the highest waves for Luce County beginning overnight Friday into Saturday.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
